goals__remit:
The Swedish Association of Road Transport Companies is the trade organisation for the Swedish haulage industry. We work for a sound and profitable development of the haulage industry. 
We monitor the haulage industry’s interests nationally and internationally. We assist our member companies’ needs in business development, influence public opinion and are involved in lobbying activities. Our aim is to boost the entire Swedish haulage industry, making it visible and raising the industry’s status.
